name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, cook the beef until browned.
Add the chopped onion and garlic to the pan and cook until soft.
Add the canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.
author: aires

name: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful Indian chicken curry made with a blend of spices.
steps: Add chicken and cook until done.
author: lovely
